description: Baseline snapshot hashes for golden path contract tests

pause-resume.description: Pause after step 1, resume, same final snapshot hash

retry.description: Fail step 2 once, retry, same snapshot hash

notes: This file is maintained manually until issue #10 (Golden Paths) is completed
Hash values will be updated when actual golden path implementations are available
Status 'pending' indicates golden path is not yet implemented
CI will pass with pending status but will validate once implemented
